about_the_game:
The Veterans Online - Beasts of War DLC gives you access to 3 unique beasts head to customize your Veterans with. Dominate the battlefield as a big headed gorilla, a cunning cat or a cute pink pig. If that's not enough, Beasts of War also includes 100 Vetlars.

Veterans Online - Beasts of War Includes:
  • - Pink Pig Female Head
  • - Gorilla Male Head
  • - Cat Male Head

Veterans Online is a top-down shooter that mixes the best features of old-school arcade twin-stick shooters with the fierce team-based competitive modes that will challenge your wits and reflexes. Designed to be enjoyed both by casuals and hardcore players, Veterans Online offers a polished and rewarding experience that never neglects its ultimate objective: Bring Together Fun & Competition.

If you're looking for a fast-paced action shooter where your skills alone dictate the outcome. You Just Found It! Sprint, roll, and use the amazing line-of-sight system to your advantage. Surprise your enemies with a well-placed mine or a perfectly timed grenade throw. Taunt them with one of several emotes after an impressive display of skill.

name: Veterans Online - Beasts Of War

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Veterans Online - Beasts Of War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 4th Gen Processor (or Equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760 / Radeon R7 260X (Or Equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: High Speed Internet (DSL or better) required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4th Gen Processor (Or Equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 (Or Equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: The Veterans Online - Beasts of War DLC gives you access to 3 unique beasts head to customize your Veterans with. Dominate the battlefield as a big headed gorilla, a cunning cat or a cute pink pig. If that's not enough, Beasts of War also includes 100 Vetlars.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Czech, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Japanese, Dutch, Thai, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
